text: Daisuke Ikeshima (; born January 30, 1975 in Ishikawa, Japan) is a retired Japanese male race walker. He set his personal best (1:19.42) in the men's 20 km on January 30, 2000 in Kobe. ==Achievements== {| |- !colspan="6"|Representing |- |1992 |World Junior Championships |Seoul, South Korea |7th |10,000m |41:45.18 |- |1994 |World Junior Championships |Lisbon, Portugal |5th |10,000m |41:01.97 |- |1995 |World Championships |Gothenburg, Sweden |35th |20 km |1:37:11 |- |1996 |Olympic Games |Atlanta, United States |22nd |20 km |1:24:54 |- |rowspan=2|1997 |World Race Walking Cup |Poděbrady, Czech Republic |16th |20 km |1:20:27 |- |East Asian Games |Busan, South Korea |bgcolor="silver" | 2nd |20,000 m |1:23:59.99 |- |rowspan=3|1999 |World Race Walking Cup |Mézidon-Canon, France |42nd |20 km |1:28:10 |- |Universiade |Palma de Mallorca, Spain |bgcolor="cc9966" | 3rd |20 km |1:26:01 |- |World Championships |Seville, Spain |17th |20 km |1:29:03 |- |2000 |Olympic Games |Sydney, Australia |27th |20 km |1:25:34 |} ==References== * * Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 1996 Summer Olympics Category:Athletes (track and field) at the 2000 Summer Olympics Category:Japanese male racewalkers Category:Olympic athletes of Japan Category:Sportspeople from Ishikawa Prefecture Category:Universiade medalists in athletics (track and field) Category:Universiade bronze medalists for Japan Category:Medalists at the 1999 Summer Universiade
title: Daisuke Ikeshima
